title: Analog and Digital Clock AW-7
summary: Original analog and digital watch face for Android Wear
description: Original analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date. Application supports 12/24 time format.To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.* Top side: show date on/off;* Bottom side: to change secondary color (there are 2 colors).
descriptionHTML:
Original analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date.
Application supports 12/24 time format.
To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.
* Top side: show date on/off;
* Bottom side: to change secondary color (there are 2 colors).
comments: کیرم شاخ شده الان میخاد بره به گون ننت کیرم شاخ شوده میخاد بره تو کس خاحرت
◉ Ver さらりと 評価結果
